trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of <xref:System.IAsyncResult> for use by XML Web service proxies to implement the standard asynchronous method pattern.
trans-unit.target: 提供的实现<xref:System.IAsyncResult>以供 XML Web 服务代理实现的标准异步方法模式。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous XML Web service request.
trans-unit.target: 取消的异步的 XML Web 服务请求。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object provided in the last parameter to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref> method asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: 获取到的最后一个参数中提供的对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref>方法异步调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> provided in the last parameter to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref> method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>到的最后一个参数中提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref>方法调用。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>用于等待异步操作以完成。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> can be used to perform a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>, or <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> to wait for the asynchronous call to complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>可以用于执行<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>，或<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>等待异步调用完成。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
Gets a value indicating whether the Begin call completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步完成开始调用。

trans-unit.source: If CompletedSynchronously is set to `true` within the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate, it is probable that the thread that called <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> is the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CompletedSynchronously 设置为`true`内<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委托，但很可能，调用线程<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>是当前线程。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you should be careful about making another asynchronous Begin call from the callback method, since it can cause the stack to grow without bound if the calls continue to complete synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你应谨慎进行另一个异步 Begin 从回调方法中调用，因为它可能会导致堆栈增长而无需绑定如果在调用继续同步完成。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the call should be completed at the original call site, outside the callback method.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应在原始调用站点，外部的回调方法完成的调用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Begin call completed synchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果开始调用完成同步进行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the asynchronous XML Web service request has completed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已完成的异步的 XML Web 服务请求。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the asynchronous XML Web service request has completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果异步 XML Web 服务请求已完成;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
